  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:atlas.fri.uni-lj.si:trubar1:fizleti/120264</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>trubar1:fizleti/120264</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="sl">Kotaljenje kolesa</string>
            <string language="en">Rolling of a wheel</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Rollen eines Rades</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Roulement d'une roue</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Rolling de uma roda</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Rolling di una rotella</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κύλισμα μιας ρόδας</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Balanceo de una rueda</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Kolo se kotali brez  spodrsavanja, medtem ko ga vlečemo z vrvico, ovito okoli njegovega  obsega.</string>
            <string language="en">A wheel rolls without slipping while pulled by a string wrapped around its circumference</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">fizlet</string>
            <string language="en">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">kotaljenje</string>
            <string language="en">rolling</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">vrtenje</string>
            <string language="en">rotation</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ein Rad rollt, ohne zu gleiten, während es durch
eine Zeichenkette gezogen wird, die um seinen Umkreis aufgewickelt 
wird</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une roue roule sans glisser tandis que tirée par
une chaîne de caractères enroulée autour de sa circonférence</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uma roda rola sem deslizar quando puxada por uma 
corda envolvida em torno de sua circunferência</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Una rotella rotola senza slittare mentre tirata 
da una stringa avvolta intorno alla relativa circonferenza</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια ρόδα κυλά χωρίς ολίσθηση ενώ τραβιέται από μια 
συμβολοσειρά που τυλίγεται γύρω από την περιφέρειά της</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una rueda rueda sin deslizarse mientras que es 
tirada por una cadena envuelta alrededor de su circunferencia</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Rollen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Umdrehung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">roulement</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">rotation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">rolling</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">rotação</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">rolling</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">rotazione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">κύλισμα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">περιστροφή</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">physlet</string>

          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">balanceo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">rotación</string>
          </keyword>
